firestore-get.useConstraints: Do you want to sort and order your data?
firestore-get.passThrough: If a message arrives, pass the message?

tooltip.referenceType: The type of reference you want to read

tips.tip0: You can use constraints for the query by setting the msg.constraints property.
tips.tip1: If msg.constraints is set, the query constraints defined in the node will be replaced by those contained in the message.
